alert.note: Alert for Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:04PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 530 PM MST... At 503 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Hilltop, or 22 miles northeast of Globe, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hilltop and Sawmill. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 266 and 286. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
